text: Mário Procopio is a volleyball player from Brazil. Mário competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born on 16 November 1948 and died on 12 January 2020.Mário Procópio == References == Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Brazilian volleyball players Category:Sportspeople from Belo Horizonte
title: Mário Procopio
